projects.name: Ranked - [1v1 DSA Battles]
projects.description: A competitive coding platform that matches users in real-time 1v1 DSA battles
responsibilities: Designed and implemented the entire backend, including APIs for matchmaking, code submission, judging, result processing, and rating updates.
Set up and integrated Judge0 (an open-source code execution engine) in an AWS EC2 instance to evaluate user-submitted code in real-time.
Utilized Redis for implementing a real-time matchmaking queue and leaderboard, using data structures like Sorted Sets for performance-critical ranking operations.

projects.name: Dhidvara - [NextGen AI Terminal]
projects.description: A warp like terminal that gives command suggestions and executes commands using AI.
responsibilities: Developed a terminal emulator using electron and React.js.
Integrated LLMs to provide real-time command suggestions while typing using Groq.
Implemented task automation via natural language prompts using @ commands.
Designed a custom terminal interface with support for AI ghost text and PTY handling.
